snippet: Many parents prefer to “redshirt” a young child by holding her out of kindergarten for an extra year. This reader has the opposite problem — her just-shy-of-the-cut-off child is ready to go.
abstract: Many parents prefer to “redshirt” a young child by holding her out of kindergarten for an extra year. This reader has the opposite problem — her just-shy-of-the-cut-off child is ready to go.

headline.main: Ready for Kindergarten, and Missing the Cutoff
